This dishwasher safe nonstick jumbo cooker's heavy-duty construction heats fast and evenly
Durable, top-quality nonstick interior provides easy food release and fast cleanup
Double-riveted handles provide a confident grip; helper handle aids in moving the pan when filled
Oven safe to 350 degrees Fahrenheit, this nonstick jumbo cooker includes a shatter-resistant glass lid
This nonstick jumbo cooker complements skillets, sets and other items throughout the Farberware collection
body.description: Sizeable enough to help cook everything from one-pan meals to generous side dishes, the Farberware Dishwasher Safe Nonstick Jumbo Cooker with Helper Handle is a convenient addition to cookware collections. Farberware has been trusted by families for over 100 years, and this dishwasher safe covered jumbo pot continues that tradition for a new generation with easy cleanup for everyday use. Constructed from heavy-duty aluminum that heats fast and evenly to help reduce hot spots that can burn foods, this large nonstick pan is the perfect size for cooking a big batch of red potatoes and onions, or for simmering meatballs in mushroom sauce for a weeknight dinner. The large pan’s interior features long-lasting, top-quality nonstick for effortless food release and easy cleanup. And a shatter-resistant glass lid allows foods to be monitored without losing heat or moisture. Oven safe to 350°F, this nonstick large cooking pan complements the skillets, sets and other items throughout the Farberware collection.Making one-pan meals and large side dishes just got easier with the versatile, generously-sized Farberware Dishwasher Safe Nonstick Aluminum 6-Quart Covered Jumbo Cooker with Helper Handle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Farberware's Dishwasher Safe Collection This Dishwasher Safe collection comes in an expanded range of shapes, sizes and colors for everyday use and kitchen style. Just as the name says, this collection is dishwasher safe for easy clean up convenience - an added benefit for the busy kitchens and cooks.

Features Durable Construction Sturdy, dependable cookware construction heats quickly and evenly for quality results. Long-lasting Nonstick Top-quality nonstick interiors release foods easily for fast cleanup Sturdy Handles The comfortable handles are double riveted to provide extra strength. See-through Lids Shatter-resistant glass lids allow the cooking process to be monitored while keeping heat, flavors and moisture sealed in.

Perfect for Any Recipe Available in different shapes and sizes for cooking convenience. Dishwasher Safe Allows for quick and easy cleanup. Variety of Color Expanded color selection for any kitchen style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge pan for one pot dinners!
reviews.reviewText: I used to use a pan for making large meals and (depending on the recipe) they would overflow out of my large saute pan. I bought this one because it sounded big enough to hold a lot of food and not spill over. It did just that. I can make big meals now without having to use two different pots and pans. I just cook in the one big pan and it's great! The non-stick aspect of it is a plus as well. I will say that once I purchased the pan it was too wide for our stove and it would go over the edge of the stove, but since we got a new stove it works great on the biggest burner and evenly distributes the heat. Would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good to cook in
reviews.reviewText: Love the color and the non stick works good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite pan.
reviews.reviewText: Excellent huge pan I bought to make fried rice in. Great for pan frying, stir frying and chicken con pollo. Easy to pick up due to 2 handles and clear lid helps prevent burning. Browns meat nicely with butter, not so much with oil. Similar pan $10 cheaper at wholesale club but not same brand. Cleans easy, limitless options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large covered skillet.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for what I needed. Just a little heavy but the extra handle is very helpful. Easy to wash. A good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Granted, I have only used it once - but I love the lighter weight and the size of the pan. May not hold up quite as long as the high dollar, heavier pans, but for this size of pan I need to be able to easily lift with one hand and pour out excess oil then also pour out gravy while using a spatula iin the other hand which is super difficult with the heavier pans. Worked great for chicken fried steak. Exactly the size I wanted. Good value. Like the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pan for one dish meals for my family.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a cast iron skillet to make one dish meals that we love for years. Needless to say having a much lighter weight pan that has two handles that don't heat up with the pan is a game changer. The lid is a nice touch also. I never did find a lid that exactly fit the iron skillet. Very happy with it. Its coated on the inside making it a breeze to clean. Love it.

reviews.reviewerName: Just a mother, Grandmother and Great Grandmother
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 2 daughters love this pan. I am now ordering the 3rd one for my oldest daughter.
reviews.reviewText: I bought 1 in December for my daughter's birthday and she loves it! She cooks & cleans it with the Proper tools. She thanks me everyday! So in January my Baby Daughter's Birthday I ordered the same one! She says the same thing about this pan. She loves it & it's the bast pan she's had. Now my oldest daughters Birthday is in 4 days. So, 1 more time I will order this pan. Well see what she has to say! The Dear Good Lord has Blessed me with a total of 4 daughters! My other daughter will be getting hers in July!!!!!! I'm very happy that their happy. They all live out of town, I am telling you what come's from their word of month. They all have big families and says it's perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this pan.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace another pan. It was the same exact pan just a different color and had lasted us 3 years si I figured I would buy the same brand. It cooks large meals perfectly. I only use wooden or plastic on it when cooking. I love the color and it's very sturdy. Love it.
